website_summaries.verdict: The Vizio SB362An-F6 offers astoundingly good value, with excellent sound quality and a high degree of flexibility for a budget sound bar.
pros: The Vizio SB362An-F6 produces impressive sound for such a cheap bit of kit
The inclusion of Dolby, DTS and Virtual:X sound modes ensures a high level of soundtrack compatibility
cons: Paying more for the Vizio SB3621 with an external subwoofer will bring enhanced performance
The LED display is a little hard to grok

customer_reviews.title: Good bass and midrange
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday present for my son, and he really likes it. He is a musician and good sound is important to him, so he was impressed with this fairly inexpensive sound bar. The only fault he found was less high frequency, but was very pleased with the midrange and bass.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Oliver

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on 12/6/18, it’s now 1/27/19 and the volume goes up and down, the mute doesn’t work anymore. The sound isn’t great, I can’t find a happy medium. It’s either too loud or to quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup..
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today.... AMAZING SOUND .... LOVE THIS SOUNDBAR.... DEFINITELY RECCOMEND PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit for my apartment
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker bar. It is replacing an older Vizio unit that died. I set this up under Vizio TV and hooked up via optical cord. I have a Roku and Vizio 3D Blu-ray. I'd love ability to have all devices run through speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Sacco

customer_reviews.title: watch out for description of product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to use on my smart tv but it was not compatible because I have a Roku Sharp tv. Therefore it was no good for me to use. That's why I want to return it to your company. Thank you. Sheree Gill It was opened in order to install it, but then found that Roku does not support the Vizio.
customer_reviews.author: SHEREE ORDERS

customer_reviews.title: A Factory Renewed Item DOA on all connections
customer_reviews.text: Sorry... I did not intend to mislead you BUT THIS WAS A RENEWED ITEM! DOA- sound bar Power LEDs illuminated and all features and status LEDs worked as advertised. Speaker would not pair with Bluetooth devices. No sound came from speakers Product,remote control and wiring looked like new and unused. Connection was being attempted to a 5 month old LG 55in TV. I am replacing a Bose Solo 5 SB that sounded terrible.
customer_reviews.author: telfonejack

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my mother and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted an upgrade from her backward facing TV speakers. And this sound bar works good for the money. The size is perfect because its low profile and doesn't interfere with the tvs Infrared light. The sound quality is impressive! I do wish they had the LED screen on remote so you can tell what function your on but I've explained it to her many of times. And the optical input is in a odd spot because every time its slightly moved it comes loose but small problem for the quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Ledger

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Setting it up I found that plugging it up into the headphone jack of the TV worked so have been using it that way for about 6 months. Makes it easier to hear TV shows, movies, sports. Good sound but won't blow you away like in a movie theater. Maybe if I got it to work through one of the other audio ports it would be even better? Not disappointed, does the job well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: sound is good
customer_reviews.text: The sound output is very genuine and high quality. But its integrity with the tv remote is bad. The speaker doesnt accept tv remote prpgramming even after entering into programming mode. I use Samsung 7 series tv
customer_reviews.author: Sidhant Goel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/ price ....
customer_reviews.text: God sound, arrives on time, very easy to use and install, I really like the sound...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts but was supposed to be new....
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a Christmas gift for my girlfriend and can't use it because the wall mounts are missing. There is a spot for them in the accessories box but no mounts. So it's still sitting in the box until I figure out a way to wall mount it. That was one of the reasons I went with this model. Maybe I'll get to post how it sounds once I can get it mounted.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound bar with built in sub-woofer. Great sound and simple setup.
customer_reviews.author: RJG1999

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for anybody
customer_reviews.text: I will purchase three I have purchased three of these for use in our children’s department, youth room, and at our North campus Sunday school room. They work great and the sound quality is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: been great
customer_reviews.text: didn't even realize i was buying a used product until it came, and said i'll try it out. it's been GREAT! downsized from my 20 yr bose system and was like lets just give it a shot. sounds great, small size, big sound!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Uchytil

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed from audio dude
customer_reviews.text: Wow did this blow me away. Very surprised on how good this sounds. For 65 it is very much so worth the money. I’d pay 150 or more for it. I was very very surprised will buy another for bedroom soon.
customer_reviews.author: Milo Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does Not operate as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Returned sound bar, when it did work it sounded ‘tinny’. Tried working out problems with Vizio reps but never got a reasonable answer. Reps were hard to understand possibly English was their second language? That was not the major problem with how to connect and operate the sound bar, but it was frustrating nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold L Wells

customer_reviews.title: Vizio performed better than Bose
customer_reviews.text: Had a Bose but did not compare to this product.The visio was much clearer and volume control much better.Bose was muffled and volume could not go high enough to understand what was being said
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount. Works really well with my vizio tv.
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer123

customer_reviews.title: I reckon it's the best bang for buck soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my parents as their TV was a tad quite for the living room. They really like the remote too (I had desktop speakers hooked up at first so they didn't like getting up to adjust the volume). I'm a little but of an audio fanatic and honestly, this thing sounds damn good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Danner S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: wanted to use the tv in my shop while running the CNC machine. the volume and speakers on the tv weren't adequate(even though the CNC is behind closed sliders) this bar works better than I expected. plenty of volume now.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Avery

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick even though this wasn't via Prime which was a delight! Quality is very good, it's light and easy to move around when arranging it. Comes with wall mount equipment which will come in handy and a wide array of attachments to get it connected to your ideal audio output. Very happy I was able to snag one of these before they ran out of stock!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sounding soundbar it could be better if I added a subwoofer
customer_reviews.author: Ndugu X from B-More

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: With the accompanying optical cord the setup couldn’t have been simpler. And, for a larger than average bedroom, the sound truly fills the space quite well. And, while I don’t think I’ll hook up my iPhone all that often, the Bluetooth is a really nice touch. I highly recommend the product. It’s well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BByrdtm

customer_reviews.title: A great buy....
customer_reviews.text: Terrific speaker for listening to music videos and concerts. Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, good sound, easy setup, better than TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: skoshi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Blows away others costing several times what this one costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vizio soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Love this sound bar! Easy hook up! Great price !
customer_reviews.author: robin proctor

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: It changed everything. I thought I was watching TV & Movies before... I was wrong. This Vizio Soundbar is good quality. I would definitely recommend it to friends & family.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Easy to set up took less then 5 minutes. Low profile so does not interfere with TV picture, sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for TCL ROKU TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought for TCL ROKU TV. Would not pair. Kept it for Visio TV upstairs. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: dmwent

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Speaker works good the only reason why I gove it 3 stars is because it doesn’t syn my tv to the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus González

customer_reviews.title: easy install
customer_reviews.text: we are wowed by the sound difference! you cant go wrong with this sound bar, so easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Judene Kuszak

customer_reviews.title: Amazon renew item NOT test and missing item
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar arrived without any kind of audio cable for connection to TV. Second no screws to hang it to the wall. It seem like Amazon did not do any testing before send the unit out
customer_reviews.author: Minh Thu Thi Pham

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: crisp, compact, good boom, good bang for the buck I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Excellent design and functionality. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D. Laughrey

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and bass for $100
customer_reviews.text: This bar sounds gooood for only $100. Both movies and music sound great. Rhe bass won't shatter glass, but it is clear and definitely potent.
customer_reviews.author: Xilyx

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: A+ great sound bar with max return on your investment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael ward

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat the sound quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to small tv.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my needs for a second TV setup for the grandkids when they are over.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Shervin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and good value and is large improvement over TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ease of programing
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything best part the ease of hooking it and programing
customer_reviews.author: Jane Sypolt

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The wiring set-up is awkward and the overall sound is weak.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gauthier

product_meta.title: Vizio SB362An-F6 36” 2.1 Channel Soundbar with Built-in Dual Subwoofers
product_meta.description: Experience the power of clear sound with the Vizio 36 Inch 2 1 Channel Sound Bar The Vizio 2 1 can be laid down flat or upright delivering sound upward or projecting it forward 2 brackets and a mounting guide are included for easy installation The grille itself features a cloth covering with a trapezoid contour which helps to release air moved by the drivers for more efficient performance Beneath the grille two drivers and dual 4-inch subwoofers deliver clear sound throughout your space There's also an LED indicator to tell you what volume bass and EQ levels you're at The 2 EQ modes are music and movie which allow you to switch back and forth between the two and adjust the bass and treble to your liking There's a standard array of playback tracking and volume controls in the center of the remote so you're always in control of your sound The back panel houses connections for the included optical cable the included 0 14-inch aux cable and a USB cable Bluetooth capabilities also allow you to stream wirelessly Enjoy quality sound with the Vizio 36 Inch 2 1 Channel Sound Bar
feature_bullets: Brand New in box The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars133 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
